titleStmt.title: All the French Psalm tunes with English words Being a collection of Psalms accorded to the verses and tunes generally vsed in the Reformed churches of France and Germany. Perused and approved by judicious divines, both English and French.
Bible. O.T. Psalms English.
titleStmt.author: Standish, John, fl. 1632.
